opponent.label: Shamiko
opponent.from: Machikado Mazoku (The Demon Girl Next Door)
opponent.description: A demon girl living in Tama city, Tokyo. While generally impulsive, clumsy, and a more than a little airheaded, her kind nature and empathy draw others to her side. Seeks to draw closer/vanquish her close friend/nemesis Momo, and uncover the mysteries of the town's past.
